text: @TeamPelosi trump can’t control Coronavirus so he covers his eyes so he can’t see it just like a toddler. His lies saying Coronavirus will disappear get more pathetic with time. His incompetence, arrogance and ignorance is killing Americans! Vote for Biden for a better world.
